languages.text: "Хотела бы я возразить". {n}Легкий смешок срывается с губ Ирлиэт.{/n} "Но я совершила ошибку. И скрывала от тебя свои чувства и переживания. Кто знает, может и ты тоже. Но пока мы идем одной дорогой, у нас есть шанс стать лучше, чем мы были прежде".

"I wish I could argue otherwise." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I made a mistake. And I concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk the same road, we have a chance to become better than we were before."
languages.original_text: "Хотела бы я возразить". {n}Легкий смешок срывается с губ Ирлиэт.{/n} "Но я совершила ошибку. И скрывала от тебя свои чувства и переживания. Кто знает, может и ты тоже. Но пока мы идем одной дорогой, у нас есть шанс стать лучше, чем мы были прежде".

traits.locale_text: "I would have like to object." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I have made a mistake. And concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk down the same path, we have a chance to become the better versions of ourselves."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would have like to object." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I have made a mistake. And concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk down the same path, we have a chance to become the better versions of ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "I wish I could argue otherwise." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I made a mistake. And I concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk the same road, we have a chance to become better than we were before."

traits.locale_text: "I wish I could argue otherwise." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I made a mistake. And I concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk the same road, we have a chance to become better than we were before."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我真希望我能驳倒你的论点。”{n}伊莉耶特露出一丝笑意。{/n}“但我确实犯下了大错，也对你隐瞒了我的真实感受和情绪，或许你也做过同样的事情。不过，只要我们仍旧并肩而行，我们就有机会慢慢敞开心扉，成为越来越好的人。”
languages.original_text: "I wish I could argue otherwise." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I made a mistake. And I concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk the same road, we have a chance to become better than we were before."

traits.locale_text: “我真希望我能驳倒你的论点。”{n}伊莉耶特露出一丝笑意。{/n}“但我确实犯下了大错，也对你隐瞒了我的真实感受和情绪，或许你也做过同样的事情。不过，只要我们仍旧并肩而行，我们就有机会慢慢敞开心扉，成为越来越好的人。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Ojalá pudiese decir lo contrario». {n}Una breve risita brota de los labios de Yrliet.{/n} «Pero he cometido un error. Y te he ocultado mis sentimientos y mis emociones. Quizá tú hayas hecho lo mismo. Pero mientras recorramos el mismo camino, aún tenemos una oportunidad de ser mejores de lo que éramos».
languages.original_text: "I wish I could argue otherwise." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I made a mistake. And I concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk the same road, we have a chance to become better than we were before."

traits.locale_text: «Ojalá pudiese decir lo contrario». {n}Una breve risita brota de los labios de Yrliet.{/n} «Pero he cometido un error. Y te he ocultado mis sentimientos y mis emociones. Quizá tú hayas hecho lo mismo. Pero mientras recorramos el mismo camino, aún tenemos una oportunidad de ser mejores de lo que éramos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'aimerais pouvoir prétendre le contraire, {n}réplique Yrliet avec un petit rire.{/n} Mais j'ai bien commis une erreur et j'ai cherché à vous cacher les sentiments et les émotions que je ressens pour vous. Peut-être en avez-vous fait de même. Cependant, tant que nous cheminons ensemble, nous avons une chance de devenir {mf|meilleurs|meilleures}. »
languages.original_text: "I wish I could argue otherwise." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I made a mistake. And I concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk the same road, we have a chance to become better than we were before."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais pouvoir prétendre le contraire, {n}réplique Yrliet avec un petit rire.{/n} Mais j'ai bien commis une erreur et j'ai cherché à vous cacher les sentiments et les émotions que je ressens pour vous. Peut-être en avez-vous fait de même. Cependant, tant que nous cheminons ensemble, nous avons une chance de devenir {mf|meilleurs|meilleures}. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wünschte, ich könnte dagegen argumentieren." {n}Ein kurzes Lachen entgleitet Yrliets Mund.{/n} "Aber ich habe einen Fehler begangen. Und ich habe meine Gefühle vor Euch verborgen. Vielleicht habt Ihr das auch getan. Aber solange wir dieselbe Straße beschreiten, haben wir eine Chance, besser zu werden als bevor."
languages.original_text: "I wish I could argue otherwise." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I made a mistake. And I concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk the same road, we have a chance to become better than we were before."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wünschte, ich könnte dagegen argumentieren." {n}Ein kurzes Lachen entgleitet Yrliets Mund.{/n} "Aber ich habe einen Fehler begangen. Und ich habe meine Gefühle vor Euch verborgen. Vielleicht habt Ihr das auch getan. Aber solange wir dieselbe Straße beschreiten, haben wir eine Chance, besser zu werden als bevor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「そうではないと反論できればいいのだが」{n}ユリエットの唇から短い笑いが漏れる。{/n}「しかし、我は過ちを犯した。そして自分の気持ちや感情を隠してしまった。おそらくお前も同じことをしたのだろう。だが、同じ道を歩く限り、以前よりも良くなる機会は残されているのだ」
languages.original_text: "I wish I could argue otherwise." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I made a mistake. And I concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk the same road, we have a chance to become better than we were before."

traits.locale_text: 「そうではないと反論できればいいのだが」{n}ユリエットの唇から短い笑いが漏れる。{/n}「しかし、我は過ちを犯した。そして自分の気持ちや感情を隠してしまった。おそらくお前も同じことをしたのだろう。だが、同じ道を歩く限り、以前よりも良くなる機会は残されているのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Keşke aksini söyleyebilsem." {n}Yrliet'in dudaklarından kısa bir kahkaha dökülüyor.{/n} "Fakat ben bir hata yaptım, duygularımı ve hislerimi senden gizledim. Belki sen de aynısını yapardın ama aynı yolda yürümeye devam ettiğimiz sürece daha iyi olabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "I wish I could argue otherwise." {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "But I made a mistake. And I concealed my feelings and emotions from you. Perhaps you have done the same. But as long as we walk the same road, we have a chance to become better than we were before."

traits.locale_text: "Keşke aksini söyleyebilsem." {n}Yrliet'in dudaklarından kısa bir kahkaha dökülüyor.{/n} "Fakat ben bir hata yaptım, duygularımı ve hislerimi senden gizledim. Belki sen de aynısını yapardın ama aynı yolda yürümeye devam ettiğimiz sürece daha iyi biri olabiliriz."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
